resources._note: Options: MB, GB. This is only used on the user side, admin will use GB.

stripe.note: The key is the stripe API key and the coins is the amount per Â£1. If the stripe API key is invalid and stripe purchases are enabled, Heliactyl will crash when attempting to do transactions.

api.code: Default API Key (Change this to any string you want)

joinguild._comment: The Discord bot must be in these servers and have invite permissions. Automatic guild joining will not work unless role packages are configured correctly. You can always just set it to a random role & package so that only this works.

giverole._comment: Both the bot and the user must be on the server, give the specify role on registering

oauth2._comment: Go to https://discord.dev/ and create an application to set these up.

rolePackages.note: This allows you to set a different plan to people who have a specific role however this requires the Discord bot to be configured and functioning. This is mainly used for Boost rewards

store._comment: The cost and per is not intended to used with 0. This is not intended to sell resources for coins. Make sure coins are enabled too, or else there can be errors.

arcio._comment: This is no longer supported and will be removed in the future. The AFK page has worked without arc.io since v11.4.0.

afk page._comment: This will not effect any current arc.io sessions, and will require a restart to kick everyone out of the websocket sesison.
afk page._comment2: Make sure coins are enabled if you choose to enable this option!
afk page._comment3: If you change the path, you need to restart for it to take full effect.
afk page._comment4: This afk page will give the users [coins variable] coins every [every variable] seconds.
afk page._comment5: The coins variable is meant to not be under 1. There may be bugs if the coins variable is less than 1.

whitelist.note: This allows only specific people to be able to use the dashboard

servercreation.note: You can set how much it should cost to create a server here, the default price is free

renewals.note: The cost is the amount of coins required to renew, and the delay is the amount of days before they need to renew. New servers after the 1st one will also cost the renewal amount. This has been fixed to suspend servers instead of deleting them as of v12.7.0.

antivpn.note: For antivpn to work, generate an apikey on https://proxycheck.io/. If you put no key, Heliactyl will disable antivpn.
